message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.SI, cs.CY 

This paper deals with analyzing user reviews and predicting product ratings, which falls under the domain of information retrieval (cs.IR) and natural language processing (cs.CL). The use of representative users to predict ratings involves machine learning techniques (cs.LG) and the study of rating behavior across different cuisines can be considered as a social influence analysis (cs.SI). Finally, the paper also deals with the hidden information in user reviews, which can be related to privacy and security (cs.CY).
